name: WolfenRedux-Demo
description:
-WolfenRedux is a 3D Fps which is made in wolfenstein3d art style.

-Game uses Raycasting to detect collsions.

-Game has autosaves after level is completed,Load game loads the current level

-Controls

  • WASD - Move
  • SHIFT - Run
  • MOUSE -Shoot

-Textures and majority of scripts by JimmyVegas
